issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Implement Gandiva Filter/Projector in Scanner
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6953](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6953). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, we have `RecordBatchProjector` and `ExpressionEvaluator` to achieve this feature. This would implement a single class that fuse both and uses gandiva. This would be exposed in the ScannerBuilder via an option.
